text: The Canadian Encyclopedia (TCE; ) is the national encyclopedia of Canada. It was published online by the Historica Canada. It also has the support of Canadian Heritage. They are available for free online in both English and French. The Canadian Encyclopedia includes more than 19,500 articles in both languages about anything that is related to the country's history, culture, geography and entertainment areas.me ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Site officiel Category:Encyclopedias
title: The Canadian Encyclopedia
